channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [CASSANDRA-9880] ScrubTest.testScrubOutOfOrder should generate test file on the fly
item.description:
ScrubTest#testScrubOutOfOrder is failing on trunk due to the serialization format change from pre-generated out-of-order SSTable.

We should change that to generate out-of-order SSTable on the fly so that we don't need to bother generating SSTable by hand again.
item.summary: ScrubTest.testScrubOutOfOrder should generate test file on the fly

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
Patch attached as link.
Let's see what cassci says.
The code is +1 but we need to rebase. There are also a couple of unused imports.

Force pushed rebased version to: https://github.com/yukim/cassandra/tree/9880

Can you check the code again?
ScrubTest still passes, but new API is not yet familiar to me.

I am not an expert with the new API either but it looks correct, so +1.

I created a pull request with some, mostly unrelated, suggestions:

  • keepOriginals in scrubber is not used
  • there is a BAD RELEASE error in sstable.validate(), if you are not comfortable committing this just open another ticket, exception details below
  • there is a slightly more compact API taken from fillCF().
